mapper.select:
WITH TT AS (SELECT T1.periodType , COUNT(voc_seq) AS "totalCnt" , SUM(T1.complaintCnt) AS complaintCnt , SUM(T1.complimentCnt) AS complimentCnt , SUM(T1.suggestionCnt) AS suggestionCnt , SUM(T1.inquiryCnt) AS inquiryCnt FROM (SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt, '%Y') AS "periodType"
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt, '%Y년%m월') AS "periodType"
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS "periodType"
, A.voc_seq, CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "complaintCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "complimentCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryCnt" FROM tb_voc_mst A WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.reg_dt >= date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -2 YEAR) AND A.reg_dt < ADDDATE(#{regDtEnd},1)
AND A.reg_dt >= date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -11 MONTH) AND A.reg_dt < ADDDATE(#{regDtEnd},1)
AND A.reg_dt >= ADDDATE(#{regDtStart},-1) AND A.reg_dt < ADDDATE(#{regDtEnd},1)
AND A.company_cd = #{companyCd} AND A.voc_type_cd1 = #{vocTypeCd1} AND A.voc_type_cd2 = #{vocTypeCd2} AND A.voc_type_cd3 = #{vocTypeCd3} AND A.rcpt_chnn_cd = #{rcptChnnCd} ) T1 GROUP BY T1.periodType )
SELECT periodType , totalCnt , CASE WHEN totalYoyCnt > 0 THEN ( ( totalCnt - totalYoyCnt ) / totalYoyCnt ) * 100 WHEN totalCnt > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "totalYoyCnt" , complaintCnt , CASE WHEN totalCnt > 0 THEN (complaintCnt/totalCnt) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complaintRate"
, CASE WHEN complaintYoyCnt > 0 THEN ( ( complaintCnt - complaintYoyCnt ) / complaintYoyCnt ) * 100 WHEN complaintCnt > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complaintYoyCnt"
, complimentCnt , CASE WHEN totalCnt > 0 THEN (complimentCnt/totalCnt) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complimentRate" , CASE WHEN complimentYoyCnt > 0 THEN ( ( complimentCnt - complimentYoyCnt ) / complimentYoyCnt ) * 100 WHEN complimentCnt > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complimentYoyCnt"
, suggestionCnt , CASE WHEN totalCnt > 0 THEN (suggestionCnt/totalCnt) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionRate" , CASE WHEN suggestionYoyCnt > 0 THEN ( ( suggestionCnt - suggestionYoyCnt ) / suggestionYoyCnt ) * 100 WHEN suggestionCnt > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionYoyCnt"
, inquiryCnt , CASE WHEN totalCnt > 0 THEN (inquiryCnt/totalCnt) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryRate" , CASE WHEN inquiryYoyCnt > 0 THEN ( ( inquiryCnt - inquiryYoyCnt ) / inquiryYoyCnt ) * 100 WHEN inquiryCnt > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryYoyCnt"
FROM (
SELECT periodType , totalCnt , complaintCnt , complimentCnt , suggestionCnt , inquiryCnt , LAG(totalCnt,1) OVER(ORDER BY periodType) AS "totalYoyCnt" , LAG(complaintCnt,1) OVER(ORDER BY periodType) AS "complaintYoyCnt" , LAG(complimentCnt,1) OVER(ORDER BY periodType) AS "complimentYoyCnt" , LAG(suggestionCnt,1) OVER(ORDER BY periodType) AS "suggestionYoyCnt" , LAG(inquiryCnt,1) OVER(ORDER BY periodType) AS "inquiryYoyCnt" FROM TT ) A

SELECT A.LEV1_CUSTOM_CD AS "vocTypeCd1" , A.LEV1_CUSTOM_NM AS "vocTypeNm1"
, A.LEV2_CUSTOM_CD AS "vocTypeCd2" , A.LEV2_CUSTOM_NM AS "vocTypeNm2"
, A.LEV3_CUSTOM_CD AS "vocTypeCd3" , A.LEV3_CUSTOM_NM AS "vocTypeNm3"
, A.NOW_ALL_CNT AS "totalCnt" , CASE WHEN A.BF_ALL_CNT > 0 THEN ( ( A.NOW_ALL_CNT - A.BF_ALL_CNT ) / A.BF_ALL_CNT ) * 100 WHEN A.NOW_ALL_CNT > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "totalYoyCnt"
, A.NOW_01_CNT AS "complaintCnt" , CASE WHEN NOW_ALL_CNT > 0 THEN (NOW_01_CNT/NOW_ALL_CNT) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complaintRate" , CASE WHEN BF_01_CNT > 0 THEN ( ( NOW_01_CNT - BF_01_CNT ) / BF_01_CNT ) * 100 WHEN NOW_01_CNT > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complaintYoyCnt"
, A.NOW_02_CNT AS "complimentCnt" , CASE WHEN NOW_ALL_CNT > 0 THEN (NOW_02_CNT/NOW_ALL_CNT) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complimentRate" , CASE WHEN BF_02_CNT > 0 THEN ( ( NOW_02_CNT - BF_02_CNT ) / BF_02_CNT ) * 100 WHEN NOW_02_CNT > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "complimentYoyCnt"
, A.NOW_03_CNT AS "suggestionCnt" , CASE WHEN NOW_ALL_CNT > 0 THEN (NOW_03_CNT/NOW_ALL_CNT) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionRate" , CASE WHEN BF_03_CNT > 0 THEN ( ( NOW_03_CNT - BF_03_CNT ) / BF_03_CNT ) * 100 WHEN NOW_03_CNT > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionYoyCnt"
, A.NOW_04_CNT AS "inquiryCnt" , CASE WHEN NOW_ALL_CNT > 0 THEN (NOW_04_CNT/NOW_ALL_CNT) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryRate" , CASE WHEN BF_04_CNT > 0 THEN ( ( NOW_04_CNT - BF_04_CNT ) / BF_04_CNT ) * 100 WHEN NOW_04_CNT > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryYoyCnt" FROM ( SELECT A.LEV1_CUSTOM_CD , A.LEV1_CUSTOM_NM
, COUNT(B.VOC_TYPE_CD1) AS NOW_ALL_CNT , COUNT(C.VOC_TYPE_CD1) AS BF_ALL_CNT
, A.LEV2_CUSTOM_CD , A.LEV2_CUSTOM_NM , COUNT(B.VOC_TYPE_CD2) AS NOW_ALL_CNT , COUNT(C.VOC_TYPE_CD2) AS BF_ALL_CNT
, A.LEV2_CUSTOM_CD , A.LEV2_CUSTOM_NM , A.LEV3_CUSTOM_CD , A.LEV3_CUSTOM_NM , COUNT(B.VOC_TYPE_CD3) AS NOW_ALL_CNT , COUNT(C.VOC_TYPE_CD3) AS BF_ALL_CNT
, CASE WHEN B.VOC_CASE_CD = '01' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS NOW_01_CNT , CASE WHEN C.VOC_CASE_CD = '01' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS BF_01_CNT , CASE WHEN B.VOC_CASE_CD = '02' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS NOW_02_CNT , CASE WHEN C.VOC_CASE_CD = '02' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS BF_02_CNT , CASE WHEN B.VOC_CASE_CD = '03' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS NOW_03_CNT , CASE WHEN C.VOC_CASE_CD = '03' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS BF_03_CNT , CASE WHEN B.VOC_CASE_CD = '04' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS NOW_04_CNT , CASE WHEN C.VOC_CASE_CD = '04' THEN SUM(1) ELSE 0 END AS BF_04_CNT FROM ( SELECT LEV1.CUSTOM_CD AS "LEV1_CUSTOM_CD" , LEV1.CUSTOM_NM AS "LEV1_CUSTOM_NM"
, LEV2.CUSTOM_CD AS "LEV2_CUSTOM_CD" , LEV2.CUSTOM_NM AS "LEV2_CUSTOM_NM"
, LEV3.CUSTOM_CD AS "LEV3_CUSTOM_CD" , LEV3.CUSTOM_NM AS "LEV3_CUSTOM_NM"
FROM ( SELECT A.CUSTOM_CD , A.CUSTOM_NM , A.CUSTOM_LEVEL , A.UPPER_CUSTOM_CD , A.DISP_ORDER FROM TB_COMPANY_CUSTOM_CODE A INNER JOIN TB_COMPANY B ON A.COMPANY_SEQ = B.COMPANY_SEQ AND B.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd} WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CUSTOM_TYPE = 'VOC_TYPE' AND A.CUSTOM_LEVEL = 1 ) LEV1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CUSTOM_CD , A.CUSTOM_NM , A.CUSTOM_LEVEL , A.UPPER_CUSTOM_CD , A.DISP_ORDER FROM TB_COMPANY_CUSTOM_CODE A INNER JOIN TB_COMPANY B ON A.COMPANY_SEQ = B.COMPANY_SEQ AND B.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd} WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CUSTOM_TYPE = 'VOC_TYPE' AND A.CUSTOM_LEVEL = 2 ) LEV2 ON LEV1.CUSTOM_CD = LEV2.UPPER_CUSTOM_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CUSTOM_CD , A.CUSTOM_NM , A.CUSTOM_LEVEL , A.UPPER_CUSTOM_CD , A.DISP_ORDER FROM TB_COMPANY_CUSTOM_CODE A INNER JOIN TB_COMPANY B ON A.COMPANY_SEQ = B.COMPANY_SEQ AND B.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd} WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CUSTOM_TYPE = 'VOC_TYPE' AND A.CUSTOM_LEVEL = 3 ) LEV3 ON LEV2.CUSTOM_CD = LEV3.UPPER_CUSTOM_CD
WHERE 1=1
AND LEV1.CUSTOM_CD = #{vocTypeCd1}
AND LEV2.CUSTOM_CD = #{vocTypeCd2}
AND LEV3.CUSTOM_CD = #{vocTypeCd3}
ORDER BY LEV1.DISP_ORDER ASC
, LEV2.DISP_ORDER ASC
, LEV3.DISP_ORDER ASC
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_VOC_MST B ON A.LEV1_CUSTOM_CD = B.VOC_TYPE_CD1
AND A.LEV2_CUSTOM_CD = B.VOC_TYPE_CD2
AND A.LEV3_CUSTOM_CD = B.VOC_TYPE_CD3
AND B.REG_DT > ADDDATE(#{regDtStart}, -1) AND B.REG_DT < ADDDATE(#{regDtEnd}, 1) AND B.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND B.RCPT_CHNN_CD = #{rcptChnnCd}
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_VOC_MST C ON A.LEV1_CUSTOM_CD = C.VOC_TYPE_CD1
AND A.LEV2_CUSTOM_CD = C.VOC_TYPE_CD2
AND A.LEV3_CUSTOM_CD = C.VOC_TYPE_CD3
AND C.REG_DT > ADDDATE(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR), -1) AND C.REG_DT < ADDDATE(date_add(#{regDtEnd}, interval -1 YEAR), 1) AND C.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd} AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND C.RCPT_CHNN_CD = #{rcptChnnCd}
GROUP BY A.LEV1_CUSTOM_CD , A.LEV1_CUSTOM_NM
, A.LEV2_CUSTOM_CD , A.LEV2_CUSTOM_NM
, A.LEV3_CUSTOM_CD , A.LEV3_CUSTOM_NM
) A

WITH T AS (SELECT T1.periodType, T1.voc_act_type_cd1, T1.voc_act_type_nm1, T1.voc_act_type_cd2, T1.voc_act_type_nm2, CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "cnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN complaintCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complaintCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN complimentCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complimentCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN suggestionCnt ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN inquiryCnt ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "cnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN complaintCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complaintCnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN complimentCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complimentCnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN suggestionCnt ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionCnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN inquiryCnt ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryCnt" FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt, '%Y') AS "periodType", A.voc_act_type_cd1, fn_getCodeNm('VOC_ACT_TYPE_CD1', A.voc_act_type_cd1) AS voc_act_type_nm1, A.voc_act_type_cd2, fn_getCodeNm('VOC_ACT_TYPE_CD2', A.voc_act_type_cd2) AS voc_act_type_nm2, A.voc_seq, CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "complaintCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "complimentCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryCnt" FROM tb_voc_mst A WHERE A.voc_status_cd = 'C0' AND A.reg_dt >= date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR) AND A.reg_dt < ADDDATE(#{regDtEnd},1) AND A.company_cd = #{companyCd} AND A.voc_type_cd1 = #{vocTypeCd1} AND A.voc_type_cd2 = #{vocTypeCd2} AND A.voc_type_cd3 = #{vocTypeCd3} AND A.voc_act_type_cd1 = #{vocActTypeCd1} AND A.voc_act_type_cd2 = #{vocActTypeCd2} ) T1 ORDER BY voc_act_type_cd1, voc_act_type_cd2, periodType ) SELECT *, round(TT.complaintCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "complaintRate", round(TT.complimentCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "complimentRate", round(TT.suggestionCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "suggestionRate", round(TT.inquiryCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "inquiryRate" FROM( SELECT voc_act_type_cd1, voc_act_type_nm1, '' AS voc_act_type_cd2, '' AS voc_act_type_nm2, voc_act_type_cd2, voc_act_type_nm2, SUM(cnt) AS totalCnt, SUM(complaintCnt) AS complaintCnt, SUM(complimentCnt) AS complimentCnt, SUM(suggestionCnt) AS suggestionCnt, SUM(inquiryCnt) AS inquiryCnt, SUM(cnt-cnt1) AS totalYoyCnt, SUM(complaintCnt-complaintCnt1) AS complaintYoyCnt, SUM(complimentCnt-complimentCnt) AS complimentYoyCnt, SUM(suggestionCnt-suggestionCnt) AS suggestionYoyCnt, SUM(inquiryCnt-inquiryCnt) AS inquiryYoyCnt FROM T GROUP BY voc_act_type_cd1, voc_act_type_nm1 ,voc_act_type_cd2, voc_act_type_nm2 ) TT

WITH T AS (SELECT T1.periodType, CASE WHEN T1.actPeriod BETWEEN 0 AND 1 THEN '1일 이내' WHEN T1.actPeriod BETWEEN 2 AND 3 THEN '2일~3일' WHEN T1.actPeriod BETWEEN 4 AND 7 THEN '4일~7일' WHEN T1.actPeriod BETWEEN 8 AND 15 THEN '8일~15일' WHEN T1.actPeriod BETWEEN 16 AND 30 THEN '16일~30일' WHEN T1.actPeriod >=31 THEN '31일~' ELSE '' END AS "actPeriod", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "cnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN complaintCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complaintCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN complimentCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complimentCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN suggestionCnt ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR),1,4) THEN inquiryCnt ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryCnt1", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "cnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN complaintCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complaintCnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN complimentCnt ELSE 0 END AS "complimentCnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN suggestionCnt ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionCnt", CASE T1.periodType WHEN SUBSTR(#{regDtStart},1,4) THEN inquiryCnt ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryCnt" FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt, '%Y') AS "periodType", DATEDIFF(voc_act_dt, reg_dt) AS "actPeriod", A.voc_seq, CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "complaintCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "complimentCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "suggestionCnt", CASE A.voc_case_cd WHEN '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "inquiryCnt" FROM tb_voc_mst A WHERE A.voc_status_cd = 'C0' AND A.reg_dt >= date_add(#{regDtStart}, interval -1 YEAR) AND A.reg_dt < ADDDATE(#{regDtEnd},1) AND A.company_cd = #{companyCd} AND A.voc_type_cd1 = #{vocTypeCd1} AND A.voc_type_cd2 = #{vocTypeCd2} AND A.voc_type_cd3 = #{vocTypeCd3} AND A.voc_act_type_cd1 = #{vocActTypeCd1} AND A.voc_act_type_cd2 = #{vocActTypeCd2} ) T1 ORDER BY actPeriod, periodType ) SELECT *, round(TT.complaintCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "complaintRate", round(TT.complimentCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "complimentRate", round(TT.suggestionCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "suggestionRate", round(TT.inquiryCnt/TT.totalCnt,1) AS "inquiryRate" FROM( SELECT MAX(actPeriod) AS "actPeriod", SUM(cnt) AS totalCnt, SUM(complaintCnt) AS complaintCnt, SUM(complimentCnt) AS complimentCnt, SUM(suggestionCnt) AS suggestionCnt, SUM(inquiryCnt) AS inquiryCnt, SUM(cnt-cnt1) AS totalYoyCnt, SUM(complaintCnt-complaintCnt1) AS complaintYoyCnt, SUM(complimentCnt-complimentCnt) AS complimentYoyCnt, SUM(suggestionCnt-suggestionCnt) AS suggestionYoyCnt, SUM(inquiryCnt-inquiryCnt) AS inquiryYoyCnt FROM T ) TT
